description: Main application entry point for a React Native app using React Navigation, Supabase authentication, and various screens like feed, capture, AI chat, profile, and settings. Sets up navigation, deep linking, and auth state management.

classes.name: RootStackParamList
classes.description: TypeScript type defining navigation route parameters for the app's stack.

methods.name: MainTabs
methods.description: Defines bottom tab navigator with icons and screens for main app sections.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main functional component that manages authentication state, deep linking, and navigation setup.
